DOC.brief_summary: To collect and analyze specimens that will correlate with clinical outcomes such as acute and late toxicities, quality of life, local control, and survival of patients treated with photon/proton therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Mayo Clinic Radiotherapy Patient Outcomes Registry and Biobanking Study
DOC.criteria: 1. Treated with photon/proton at Mayo Clinic Rochester in Radiation Oncology 2. Radiation therapy for curative intent
